en.header.p: You can open the following options with the command /klan or through the Mod menu!
en.card.1.title: 1. My clan
en.card.1.desc: Manage your clan: members, points, wars.
en.card.2.title: 2. List of all clans
en.card.2.desc: Browse all clans; select one to see details.
en.card.3.title: 3. Clan ranking
en.card.3.desc: MOTD with a TOP table — compare clan levels and positions.
en.card.4.title: 4. Help and info
en.moj-klan.info.title: Clan information
en.moj-klan.info.desc: Opens a window with clan details: name, owner, members, level and upgrades.
en.moj-klan.members.title: Clan members
en.moj-klan.members.desc1: Clan info - list of members and their deposited coins.
en.moj-klan.members.desc2: Add member – invite to the clan.
en.moj-klan.members.desc3: Kick member – remove from the clan.
en.moj-klan.points.title: Clan points
en.moj-klan.points.desc1: Deposit coins to the clan – shared fund for upgrades.
en.moj-klan.points.desc2: Clan upgrades – invest in your clan's growth.
en.moj-klan.wars.title: Clan wars
en.moj-klan.wars.desc1: Challenge a clan to war – start a duel.
en.moj-klan.wars.desc3: MOTD with rules – scoring, time and rewards.
en.moj-klan.leave.title: Leave clan
en.ulepszenia.how.title: How it works?
en.ulepszenia.how.desc1: You earn points for every clan level.
en.ulepszenia.how.desc2: Coins from the clan chest are used for purchases/activations.
en.ulepszenia.damage.title: Damage // Obrażenia
en.ulepszenia.damage.desc: A flat percent bonus to damage dealt by clan members.
en.ulepszenia.resistance.title: Resistance // Odporność
en.ulepszenia.resistance.desc: Reduction of damage received in combat.
en.ulepszenia.xp.title: Experience bonus // Bonus doświadczenia
en.ulepszenia.coins.title: Coin bonus // Bonus monet
en.ulepszenia.health.title: Health // Zdrowie
en.ulepszenia.limit.title: Member limit // Ilość członków
en.ulepszenia.limit.desc: Raises the maximum number of players in the clan.
en.informacje.li.1: Once a clan is created, its name cannot be changed.
en.informacje.li.2: Coins deposited into the clan cannot be refunded.
en.informacje.li.3: Only the Owner and the Deputy can upgrade the clan.
en.informacje.li.4: To create a clan, a player must have at least level X and X coins. (These requirements may vary depending on the edition.)
en.informacje.li.5: At the beginning, you can add up to 2 members. (This limit may change in future editions.) Once the member limit is increased, you can invite more players.
